page.title: 05CHRISTCHURCH SCH,CHELTENHAM
page.content: I go to Christ Church Primary school. It is over one hundred years old and has about two hundred pupils. Every year we have a school play and most of the juniors take part in it. We have a swimming gala, Christmas party and at the end of term we have a disco and leavers party. On Wednesdays different classes do an assembly for the rest of school. We have a hamster and a Rabbit. On certain days there are after school activities.On Thursdays there is a Dance Club,on Mondays Gymnastics and on Tuesdays drama.On Fridays in the morning we go swimming.We have eight classes,one for each year.Near the canteen we have a pond and every year we have frogs.At the top of the road is a Church where we go for services and some of us go to choir.
